sdtms-specs.name: rs_onco_ca125

sdtms-specs.name: supprs_onco_ca125
sdtms-specs.label: Supplemental Qualifiers for RS_ONCO_CA125
sdtms-specs.description: A SDTM supplemental RS dataset using GCIG criteria. It is intended to be used together with `rs_onco_ca125`.
sdtms-specs.author: Vinh Nguyen

sdtms-specs.name: rs_onco_pcwg3

sdtms-specs.name: qs_metabolic
sdtms-specs.label: Questionnaire Dataset-metabolic
sdtms-specs.description: A SDTM QS dataset containing COEQ data (Control of Eating Questionnaire) for metabolic studies. Note that University of Leeds are the copyright holders of the Control of Eating Questionnaire (CoEQ) and the test data included within pharmaversesdtm as well as the ADCOEQ code are for not-for-profit use only within admiralmetabolic and pharmaverse-related examples/documentation. Any persons or companies wanting to use the CoEQ should request a license to do so from the following [link](https://licensing.leeds.ac.uk/product/control-of-eating-questionnaire-coeq).
